Name: Americano
Description: A bitter drink that improves with expensive soda water.

DescriptionLocalization.es: Una bebida amarga que mejora con agua de soda cara.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Ein bitteres Getränk, das sich mit teurem Sodawasser verbessert
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Une boisson amère qui nécéssite de l'eau pétillante haut de gamme.
DescriptionLocalization.pt: Uma bebida amarga que fica melhor com refrigerante caro.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Горький напиток,за счет дорогой содовой воды довольно вкусный.
DescriptionLocalization.tr: Pahalı soda suyuyla iyileşen acı bir içecek.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: “美国佬”鸡尾酒。这款鸡尾酒的苦味可以通过昂贵的苏打水来改善。
